HEADER.Title: Load the package parameters from VARA object

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:SET &VARA_OBJ_CONFIG# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PRV.VARA.PACKAGE_PARAMETERS" :SET &UC4RB_PUP_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT# = GET_VAR(&VARA_OBJ_CONFIG#, "CONNECTION_TIMEOUT") export CONNECTION_TIMEOUT="&UC4RB_PUP_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT#" :SET &UC4RB_PUP_READ_TIMEOUT# = GET_VAR(&VARA_OBJ_CONFIG#, "READ_TIMEOUT") export READ_TIMEOUT="&UC4RB_PUP_READ_TIMEOUT#"
:SET &VARA_API_OBJ_CONFIG# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.VARA.API_VERSIONS"
:SET &UC4RB_PUP_APIVERSION# = GET_VAR(&VARA_API_OBJ_CONFIG#, "API_VERSION") export ENV_API_VERSION="&UC4RB_PUP_APIVERSION#"
:SET &UC4RB_PUP_LOGIN_APIVERSION# = GET_VAR(&VARA_API_OBJ_CONFIG#, "LOGIN_API_VERSION") export ENV_LOGINAPI_VERSION="&UC4RB_PUP_LOGIN_APIVERSION#"
:SET &UC4RB_PUP_LOGOUT_APIVERSION# = GET_VAR(&VARA_API_OBJ_CONFIG#, "LOGOUT_API_VERSION") export ENV_LOGOUTAPI_VERSION="&UC4RB_PUP_LOGOUT_APIVERSION#"
: SET &UC4RB_PUP_DB_APIVERSION# = GET_VAR(&VARA_API_OBJ_CONFIG#, "DB_API_VERSION") export ENV_DB_API_VERSION="&UC4RB_PUP_DB_APIVERSION#"

DOCU_Docu.DOC: This include is used to load two paramaters manily connection time out and read time out form the VARA PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PRV.VARA.PACKAGE_PARAMETERS, API versions from the VARA PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.VARA.API_VERSIONS and set the values in the system variables. It can only be used for Unix environment
